statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id FROM user_preferences
SELECT voice_settings FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT user_id, voice_settings FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT voice_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, voice_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, voice_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, voice_type FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language, accent FROM user_preferences ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_settings;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 'e9d9a7ac-1ff4-4f5d-8544-2a00b5033783';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, voice_type, language FROM user_preferences ORDER BY voice_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM user_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.voice_type, s.setting_name, s.setting_value FROM user_preferences u JOIN user_settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.language = 'English' AND s.setting_name = 'theme';
SELECT DISTINCT language FROM user_preferences WHERE accent IN ('American', 'British') ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, voice_type FROM user_preferences WHERE voice_speed > 3;
SELECT voice_type, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, theme_color FROM user_settings WHERE notification_settings = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM voice_recognition_history ORDER BY recognition_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, voice_type, language, voice_speed FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, notification_settings FROM user_settings WHERE notification_settings = true;
SELECT * FROM voice_recognition_history WHERE recognition_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recognition_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, voice_speed FROM user_preferences WHERE voice_speed > 3 AND language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, theme_color, notification_settings, keyboard_shortcuts FROM user_settings ORDER BY theme_color ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences LIMIT 5;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voice_profiles ORDER BY profile_name DESC;
SELECT profile_name, user_id FROM voice_profiles WHERE profile_id = 2;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM voice_settings WHERE setting_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_name LIKE 'sound%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as num_preferences FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_preferences > 2;

SELECT u.user_id, vp.profile_id, vs.setting_name FROM user_preferences u JOIN voice_profiles vp ON u.user_id = vp.user_id JOIN voice_settings vs ON vp.profile_id = vs.profile_id ORDER BY vp.profile_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_settings WHERE language = 'English' AND voice_type = 'Male';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_profiles WHERE preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, language, voice_type FROM voice_settings WHERE language = 'English' AND user_id = '67890';
